name: LD42 Heart Breaker
description:
Setting:

You are an aspiring master martial artist! Life is great!

Unfortunately, icky girls keep trying to play with you! You don't have time to play! You need to train!

You've managed to give them the slip so far, but it looks they are determined to not take "NO" for an answer...

It looks like you might not be able to punch your way out of this one...

-------------
Goal:

Reach the end of the corridor to escape to the next level.
Survive as long as you can!
Achieve a high score!

--------------
Controls:

Aim: Mouse Cursor
Punch + Move: Left Click
Pause Menu: ESC Key
